Text: excuse my ignorance, but what do i have to do after  i download the file? There are zipped files and doubt copying straight onto device will work...
@stf777: You have to decompress them with WinRAR (or 7Zip) program.
Hi after decompressing,  the map is 2.03GB.  How do I fit it on a 2GB tomtom XL?
@lex0013: remove CSpeech files in the decompressed folder, you don't need them in order to make the map work!
Hi, Put on my XL IQ Routes,  but  get message "problem with map, you cannot use this map on this device : europe - 80"

Thx for the up !
BTW do I need to patch my Tomtom devices first or patching map is enough ?
Used PDA?s up until now.

@lex0013: You have to use a cracked navcore (or patch your original one) in order to use this map.

@unisubzero: If you're using a Tomtom device  then you have to use a cracked navcore; else, if you're still using a PDA, then this map is not compatible with PDAs...
Hur acctiverar man kartan i gpsen? Hittar ej på någe:( Tack för att du dela denna i alla fall:)
